Vendored Dependencies
=====================

* [plist](https://github.com/patsplat/plist), version 3.3.0

* [ruby-macho](https://github.com/Homebrew/ruby-macho), version 1.1.0

* [backports](https://github.com/marcandre/backports), version 3.8.0
